title: Mordekaiser Skin Bug (Not sure if bug or intentional)
body: The name of the King of Clubs Mordekaiser skin was changed to Dark Crusader Mordekaiser. Is this intentional or a bug as with the change it really doesn't fit in with the other skins in the shared picture.

replies.body: Eeep! This is definitely a bug. Thanks for the report!
So KoC Morde's actually the old Dark Crusader skin's spiritual successor then?
Yep - they have the same skin ID. :P

Ah, interesting^^

Thanks for the info.
Now if I think about it Mordekaiser does lack some less serious skins^^''
Every year I hope for Santa Kaiser.
Can you tell me which guy at Riot is responsible for alternative maps like Twisted Treeline? :)
